main.not-just-british-citizens: Maa aha inaad noqotid muwaadin British ah si aad uuga codayso UK
result.result-yes: Muwadaniinta X waxay codayn karaan maalinta Khamiista 6da May
result.result-no: Muwadaniinta X ma codayn karaan maalinta doorashada UK
result.no-subtitle: Laakiin taasi micnaheedu ma aha inaadan kaqayb kareen dimuqraadiyadda.
result.register: Is diiwaan gali si aad u codayso
actions.no.first: Weli waad ka qayb qaadan kartaa bulshadaada. Waxaad tallaabo ka qaadi kartaa arrimaha ku saabsan deriskaaga oo codkaaga ha la maqlo
actions.no.second: Weli waad la xiriiri kartaa wakiillada la soo doortay oo aad weydiisan kartaa caawimaad
actions.no.third: Waad ku biiri kartaa 1million qof ah oo dalka ku nool oo si wada jir ah wax uga qabta arrimaha caddaaladda bulshada
actions.yes.first.uk: Muwadaniinta UK waxa la ogol yahay in ay codeeyaan doorashada May 2021
actions.yes.first.commonwealth: Dadka Barwaaqo sooranka u dhashay ee haysta ogalaansho joogitaanka UK way codayn karaan doorashooyinka oo dhan
actions.yes.first.eu: Muwadiniinta EU way codayn karaan doorashada 2021*
actions.yes.second: Ma aha in aad u soo qaado waraaqaha aqoonsiga si aad u codeeynta
actions.yes.third: Lagugu waydiin maayo goobta codaynta su’aalo la xidhiidha waraaqaha socdaalka ama mucaanida lagu siiyo
actions.yes.fourth: Wales cod bixiyayaasha 16 jir iyo ka wayn way codayn karaan doorashada 6da May
actions.yes.asterisk.eu: *Doorashada Scotland muwaadiniinta EU da deganaansho ama hore u deganaa ayaa codayn kara
signup.subtitle: Ka qayb qaado deriska, asxaabta iyo asxaabta shaqooyinka, si aad ugu ololeyso caddaaladda bulshada iyo danta lagu faa’iidaysto.
signup.name: Magaacaga
signup.prompt: Weynu ku xusuusin goorta iyo meesha laga codeynayo, boostada ama maalinta codbixinta.
signup.disclaimer: Saxeex sidu Citizens UK kula soo xiriiri karto.
footer.paragraph: Waxaynu nahay guriga jaaliyadaha abaabulka ee UK. Xubinteena kaladuwan waxu ka badanyahay 400 ururada madaniga ah waxaa ka mid ah iskuulada, jaamacadaha, kaniisadaha, masaajidada, sunagogyada, kooxaha waalidiinta, dhaqamada caafimaadka, samafalka iyo ururada shaqaalaha. Weynu ka madax-bannaannahay Dowladda oo waxaa na maal-galiyay xubinnimadayada iyo mashaariicdeenna.
